slide-1.title: How to Play
content: Dragon Tiger Wild comes with the latest WILD CARD bonus! Seize the opportunity to win bigger up to 127x! You just need to guess the highest card and the wild card for bigger prizes! LET’S GET WILD!!!

slide-2.title: How to Play
content: This game is played with 3 cards. 2 main cards (Dragon and Tiger) will compete to see which side has the highest value. 1 wild card is drawn to form a Bonus Wild combination.
You can bet on the Main Bet: Dragon/Tiger. Or on the wild bet combinations: Dragon Wild, Dragon Pair or Tiger Wild, Tiger Pair, and Super Wild.

slide-3.title: Bonus Wild
content: The wild card is here to form bonus combinations that can drastically increase your winnings up to 127x!
Bet on the wild bet combinations and seize the chance for multiple BONUS WILD rewards!

introduction.title: Introduction
introduction.paragraph-1: Dragon Tiger Wild is the latest game from IDNLIVE EUROPE, bringing more excitement with the addition of the Wild Card. This game offers a fresh experience for Dragon Tiger fans, with fantastic winning opportunities up to 127x! LET’S GET WILD!!!
introduction.paragraph-2: The objective of this game is to predict the highest card between Dragon and Tiger while utilizing the Wild Card to form Bonus Wild combinations for greater winnings.

general-rules.title: General Rules
steps: The game is hosted by a dealer.
The game uses 8 decks of cards in one Shoe.
At the start of each new Shoe, the dealer will draw a card to determine how many cards will be burned or discarded. A maximum of 10 cards can be discarded.
After the betting time ends, the dealer will reveal one card as the Wild Card, then deal one card each to the Dragon and Tiger.
The side with the higher value wins. The highest card is the King, worth 13 points.
If the result is a tie, half of the bets on Dragon and Tiger are returned. A tie bet only wins if both Dragon and Tiger have the same value.

dragon-tiger-wild-card.title: Dragon Tiger Wild Card
dragon-tiger-wild-card.content: Dragon Tiger Wild uses a standard deck of 52 cards, excluding jokers. The card values used in the game are as follows:

wild-bet.title: Wild Bet
wild-bet.description: As mentioned in the introduction, Dragon Tiger Wild introduces new gameplay elements and exciting bonuses. Here's how it works:
wild-bet.description-2: The Wild Card determines winnings with higher payouts compared to regular bets. There are five types of Wild bets:
wild-bet.dragon-wild: This bet wins if the Dragon card wins and matches the Wild Card value.
wild-bet.tiger-wild: This bet wins if the Tiger card wins and matches the Wild Card value.
wild-bet.super-wild: This bet wins if all three cards—Wild Card, Dragon Card, and Tiger Card—have the same value.
wild-bet.dragon-pair: This bet wins if the Dragon card and the Wild Card have the same value (Dragon does not need to win).
wild-bet.tiger-pair: This bet wins if the Tiger card and the Wild Card have the same value (Tiger does not need to win).

dragon.title: Dragon
dragon.description: Pays if the Dragon card has a higher value than the Tiger card.

tiger.title: Tiger
tiger.description: Pays if the Tiger card has a higher value than the Dragon card.

tie.title: Tie
tie.description: Pays if the Dragon and Tiger cards have the same value.

dragon-wild.title: Dragon Wild
dragon-wild.description: Pays if the Dragon hand wins and the Dragon card has the same value as the Wild card.

tiger-wild.title: Tiger Wild
tiger-wild.description: Pays if the Tiger hand wins and the Tiger card has the same value as the Wild card.

super-wild.title: Super Wild
super-wild.description: Pays if the Dragon card, Tiger card, and Wild card all have the same value.

dragon-pair.title: Dragon Pair
dragon-pair.description: Pays if the Dragon card and the Wild card have the same value.

tiger-pair.title: Tiger Pair
tiger-pair.description: Pays if the Tiger card and the Wild card have the same value.
